languages.text: "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Я больше не желаю поднимать эту тему".

traits.locale_text: "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Я больше не желаю поднимать эту тему".

languages.text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."
languages.original_text: "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Я больше не желаю поднимать эту тему".

traits.locale_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
"If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
"If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
"If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
"If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."
"If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

languages.text: «Si ese ha sido su argumento a favor de los xenos, mucho me temo que ha errado en su cálculo, {mf|novato|novata}. No quiero hablar más de este asunto».
languages.original_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: «Si ese ha sido su argumento a favor de los xenos, mucho me temo que ha errado en su cálculo, {mf|novato|novata}. No quiero hablar más de este asunto».

languages.text: “如果这就是为那些异形求情的手段，那很遗憾，你打错了算盘，新来的。我不打算再讨论这个问题了。”
languages.original_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: “如果这就是为那些异形求情的手段，那很遗憾，你打错了算盘，新来的。我不打算再讨论这个问题了。”

languages.text: « Si c'est là votre seul argument pour sauver les xénos, je crains que vous ayez mal calculé votre coup. Cette discussion est terminée. »
languages.original_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: « Si c'est là votre seul argument pour sauver les xénos, je crains que vous ayez mal calculé votre coup. Cette discussion est terminée. »

languages.text: それがゼノに対するお前の主張なら、残念だが、買いかぶりだったな、新たな血よ。これ以上議論する気はない」
languages.original_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: それがゼノに対するお前の主張なら、残念だが、買いかぶりだったな、新たな血よ。これ以上議論する気はない」

languages.text: "Wenn das Euer Argument für die Xenos war, habt Ihr Euch leider verkalkuliert, neues Blut. Ich möchte nicht weiter darüber sprechen."
languages.original_text: "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, new blood. I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Euer Argument für die Xenos war, habt Ihr Euch leider verkalkuliert, neues Blut. Ich möchte nicht weiter darüber sprechen."
